# NSFocusRingPlacement.below

**Case**

Draw the focus ring under text.

## Declaration

```swift
case below
```

## Constants

- **NSFocusRingPlacement.above**: Draw the focus ring over an image.
- **NSFocusRingPlacement.only**: Draw the focus ring if you don’t have an image or text.

items.description: Draw the focus ring over an image.
items.name: NSFocusRingPlacement.above

items.description: Draw the focus ring if you don’t have an image or text.
items.name: NSFocusRingPlacement.only
